def is_nice(arr):
    return all(x+1 in arr or x-1 in arr for x in arr) and len(arr)>0

def is_nice(arr):
    return len(arr) > 0 and all(n-1 in arr or n+1 in arr for n in arr)
is_nice=lambda l:l!=[]and[e for e in l if(e-1not in l and e+1not in l)]==[]

def is_nice(arr):
    return all(i+1 in arr or i-1 in arr for i in arr) if arr else False

def is_nice(a):
    return all(e + 1 in a or e - 1 in a for e in a) if a else False
